attributes.action: ePetitions... the Public have no confidence in them.
attributes.additional_details: As the Backbench Business Committee overseeing the e-petitions will not be making time for Parliament to discuss the two ePetitions that have, so far, successfully reached 100,000 signatures, this petition is to show disgust with politicians with the cynical way that  politicians court public opinion and then ignore it when the public participate in their games.
